attributes.title: Do not get this app!!
attributes.review: This is legitimately the worst app ever made. I got this app to find reasons if trump is a good president or not, and that did not show at all within the app, it was just spreading more lies. On top of that, the app took hours upon hours to install which my phone downloads content within minutes. This app need a lot of work or needs to be taken down immediately.

attributes.title: Cheeto‚Äôs got to go
attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst! The glitches were ~astronomical~ and the interface was not only hideous but not user friendly in any way. It represents a pitiful attempt at brainwashing, leaving me to believe that anyone capable of believing such nonsense is in fact a brainless zombie following a fake cause. I have zero doubts that this app is extremely detrimental to the community and should be taken down immediately.

attributes.title: Poor app design
attributes.review: Right off the bat we are treated to a view up Trumps nostrils. Then it just gets worse and worse. They asked for my phone number. I gave it. And all that happened was my texts BLEW UP. Next it takes up WAY TOO MUCH SPACE ON MY PHONE! The age limit is ridiculous. If there is gonna be an age limit it SHOULD be voting age. Cause why have minors right? It‚Äôs not like he really really really really REALLY REALLY likes kids.
